#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

This page describes how to build the UnivGiggle application.


= Details =

==Prerequisite:==
   *) Java SDK 
   *) Apache - Maven
   *) SVN Client to check out this project source.

==To build from command line==

 #) Checkout project source from https://univg.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/UnivGiggle-Master
 #) Go to UnivGiggle-Master folder 
 #) execute *mvn clean install*
 #) To skip the test cases use, *mvn clean install -Dmaven.test.skip*
 #) You will get the univgiggle.war file in  * UnivGiggle-Master/UnivGiggle-Server/target * folder

== Use the source from eclipse ==
 #) Download the latest eclipse IDE and install 
 #) Install SVN plugin from this link * http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.6.x *
 #) Install Maven plugin from this link * http://m2eclipse.sonatype.org/sites/m2e *
 #  Check out UnivGiggle-Master project as a maven project.
